dependencies.name: py-aiofiles
dependencies.description:
aiofiles is an Apache2 licensed library, written in Python, for handling
local disk files in asyncio applications.

dependencies.name: py-ansimarkup
dependencies.description: Produce colored terminal text with an xml-like markup.

dependencies.description: asyncio-compatible timeout context manager.

dependencies.name: py-colorama
dependencies.description: Cross-platform colored terminal text.

dependencies.name: py-graphene
dependencies.description: GraphQL Framework for Python.

dependencies.name: py-importlib-metadata
dependencies.description: Read metadata from Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-metomi-isodatetime
dependencies.description: Python ISO 8601 date time parser and data model/manipulation utilities.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-promise
dependencies.description:
This is a implementation of Promises in Python. It is a super set of
Promises/A+ designed to have readable, performant code and to provide
just the extensions that are absolutely necessary for using promises in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-protobuf
dependencies.description:
Protocol buffers are Google's language-neutral, platform-neutral,
extensible mechanism for serializing structured data - think XML, but
smaller, faster, and simpler. You define how you want your data to be
structured once, then you can use special generated source code to
easily write and read your structured data to and from a variety of data
streams and using a variety of languages.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pyzmq
dependencies.description: PyZMQ: Python bindings for zeromq.

dependencies.name: py-rx
dependencies.description: Reactive Extensions (Rx) for Python

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependencies.name: py-urwid
dependencies.description: A full-featured console UI library

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: python-venv
